column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/1c83b0a3771bc601fdc75588f2cd45318b19c526 for binaries and test log.\n
I'm interested, what benefit does this induce performance wise? Any numbers or some more details?\n

Before, the LevelDB write buffer was always 4 MiB, the LevelDB cache for both databases (one very small, one somewhat larger), and the coin cache was flushed everytime 5000 transactions changed.\n\nThis commit makes the -dbcache value better respected, by splitting it over all types of caches, using a meaningful distribution (I tried a few variations). The result is far fewer flushes during IBD, l
